entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: IDate, IDateTime, ITime Interfaces #97622
  • Source generator in System.Text.Json fails due to nullability override of property in inheritance #97621
  • [NativeAOT] StackFrameIterator.ShouldSkipRegularGcReporting is dead code #97620
  • System.Text.Json doesn't support KeyedCollection when serializing with source generation #97617
  • [Question] Case sensitivity for GetFullPath(string, string) with drive relative paths #97615
  • System.Text.Json - The required keyword causes performance degradation in deserialization with source generation #97612
  • some quesion about aot-interp mix execute mode on ios #97610
  • [workloads] Package task+targets for testing workloads into an internal package #97607
  • XmlWriter.WriteStartElement isn't virtual #97606

Closed

  • Simple net8 Blazor WASM AOT compiled App not working on Android11 downwards #97119
  • [API Proposal]: Add constants RadiansPerDegree, DegreesInCircle, and (optionally) DegreesPerRadian to System.Math. #97611

PullRequests

Created

  • Use DivRem in Decimal.DecCalc #97619
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test] test only #97614
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97613
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Format System.Runtime ref assembly sources #97609
    needs-area-label
  • Replumb TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf/Single to be on operator plan #97608
    area-System.Numerics
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Disable FEATURE_USE_SOFTWARE_WRITE_WATCH_FOR_GC_HEAP on 32-bit platforms #97618
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor how the embedded rounding is handled so the logic is more reusable #97569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most fgConnectFallThrough calls #97488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Issue 96277: Order by memory footprint #97277
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An unsafe/safe context has unexpected effect on conversion classification for collection expressions #71840
  • [VB] Use `String.Concat` for interpolated strings if possible like C# #71839

PullRequests

Created

  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #53679
  • In RCL, how to deploy reusable .scss files using nuget in .NET Blazor project instead of npm while can be referenced (using @import) by other .scss within project folder? #53682
  • Improve Error Message and/or Docs around InvariantGlobalization true by default #53678
  • [Blazor] IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync is accessing the wrong DOM in the browser #53677
  • Support passing float[] (Single[]) to JS from .NET via [JSImport] #53676
  • Kessler Windows Auth is not prompting UN/PW challenge on macOS, when server runs on windows AD. #53675
  • no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #53671
  • Provide common IHealthCheckPublisher implementation #53670

Closed

  • Interactive component looses state on Navigate to same page #52356
    Discussions
  • Blazor needs a "Angualr Hydration" similiar feature #53635
  • InteractiveServer StateHasChanged not firing but works with InteractiveWebAssembly #53662
  • Perf improvement: https #53666

PullRequests

Created

  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body. Fixes #53630 #53680
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove deprecated VS Code extension #53673
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove comment about DotNet-Blob-Feed from ci.yml #53672
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix XML docs in EndpointFilterInvocationContext.cs #53655
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error running default Maui/NET8 solution #20213
  • [iOS] Custom Debug Configuration Issue & Crash #20211
  • MAUI Editor don't show cursor(carter) position and changed symbols on edit. #20209
  • When minimumheightrequest is set on label, the label is not vertically cenetered in Windows #20208
  • Collectionview WinUI recycling item count calculation problem #20206
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItems ToolbarItem Glyph not visible on Android in non dark mode #20204

Closed

  • If Resources/Raw exceeds specific size, iOS deployment doesn't work #20201
  • ActivityIndicator IsRunning Property Binding doesn't work #20184

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed Collection View header and footer update [iOS] #20210
    community ✨
  • Fixed auto picker resizing after selection [iOS] #20207
    community ✨
  • Fixed picker title's color [iOS] #20205
    community ✨
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    community ✨

Updated

  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AlterColumnOperation_with_identity_legacy fails consistency after commit to support resetting Identity #32946
  • Assertion failure in SQLite following Blob column PR #32944
  • Automatic Path Generation for HierarchyId #32943

Closed

  • Trailing Whitespaces Appended to Fixed-Length Property in Entity Framework Core #32947
  • EFC Tooling always forces a rebuild #32801
    9.0.0
  • Add ToHashSetAsync() to IQueryable<T> #30033
    9.0.0
  • .NET8, MS VS 2022 17.8.4, Entity Framework runtime error with "Any" #32908
  • [Question] EF Core 9 plan #32942

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32941
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.3

Merged

  • Added ToHashSetAsync<T> Extension methods on IQueryable<T> #32905
    community-contribution
  • Revert "Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums (#32770)" #32945
  • Fix incremental builds #32860
    community-contribution
  • Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32938
